Title: Relates to the purchase of apparatus, materials, equipment and supplies
Summary: Relates to the purchase of apparatus, materials, equipment and supplies; excludes contracts for services related to the installation, maintenance or repair of apparatus, materials, equipment and supplies from such purchasing authority.
LawCode: Amd ยง103, Gen Muni L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the general municipal law, in relation to the purchase of apparatus, materials, equipment or supplies
